item.title: Using the CBS API to calculate the friction period in R
item.description: # Function to calculate the friction period with CBS data library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(lubridate) ## ## Attaching package: 'lubridate' ## The following object is masked from 'package:base': ## ## date library(cbsodataR) FrictionPeriods <- function(years, industry = "T001081", folderpath = NULL, download = T, yeardays = 365.
